meanings.sent1: The genii haunted the old castle, scaring anyone who dared to enter.
meanings.sent2: Legends speak of genii lurking in the shadows, ready to cause mischief.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous genii played pranks on unsuspecting travelers passing through the forest.
meanings.sent4: The genii of creativity whispered inspiration into the artist's ear, guiding their hand.
meanings.sent5: The genii of the lamp granted three wishes to the lucky finder.

meanings.definition: A guardian spirit or guiding influence
meanings.sent1: She felt the genii of her ancestors watching over her, protecting her from harm.
meanings.sent2: The wise old man was seen as a genii by the villagers, offering advice and wisdom.
meanings.sent3: The genii of good luck seemed to follow him wherever he went, bringing fortune to all he met.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition acted like a genii, guiding her towards the right decisions in life.
meanings.sent5: The genii of the forest whispered secrets to those who listened closely.

meanings.sent1: Aladdin rubbed the lamp, releasing the powerful genii who granted his wishes.
meanings.sent2: The genii emerged from the bottle, ready to fulfill the desires of its master.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous genii loved to play tricks on those who summoned it.
meanings.sent4: The genii of the lamp possessed great magical powers, capable of incredible feats.
meanings.sent5: The genii of the ring appeared in a puff of smoke, ready to serve its new master.
